name: omz13/kirby3-xmlsitemap
description: kirby3 plugin to generate an xml-based sitemap

scripts.zip: rm omz13-kirby3-xmlsitemap.zip; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; composer archive --format=zip --file=omz13-kirby3-xmlsitemap; composer require getkirby/cms: 'dev-master as 3.0.0 | >=3.0.0-beta-3'; composer dumpautoload -o;
